rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception counter, built using Art Deco elements like geometric patterns and metallic accents.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed in Art Deco style, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, ornate moldings, and high ceilings. Vastu principles ensure the south-west wall remains unobstructed.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, with a view from floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and ventilation. The layout aligns with Vastu guidelines for auspicious dining area placement.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern Art Deco finishes, built-in cabinetry, and a pass-through window for natural light. Placement respects Vastu by avoiding direct alignment with the main entrance.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom features elegant Art Deco detailing, en-suite bathroom, and floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced ventilation. Oriented towards the north-east to maximize natural light and positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed in a balanced Art Deco style with adequate natural lighting through strategically placed windows. Vastu principles ensure calm and restful ambiance.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space featuring rich wood finishes, built-in shelves, and a large window for ample light, adhering to Art Deco aesthetics and Vastu guidelines for knowledge and creativity.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room with Art Deco design elements. Floor-to-ceiling windows ensure natural ventilation; positioned as per Vastu for harmonious energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Main)
rooms.description: Primary bathroom located near the master bedroom, designed with Art Deco fixtures and ample lighting through adjacent windows. Vastu considerations ensure a balanced flow of energy.

openings.description: A grand entrance door with decorative metalwork, positioned in the south-west corner as per Vastu for welcoming positive energy.
Multiple floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into living areas and bedrooms to enhance natural light and ventilation, in keeping with Art Deco style.
A small verandah or balcony adjoining the entrance lobby to serve as a transitional space between outdoors and indoors, designed using Art Deco detailing.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom - Upper Suite
rooms.description: An elevated master bedroom offering a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced views and ventilation, following Art Deco aesthetics and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2 (Upper)
rooms.description: An additional bedroom on the first level, featuring a private balcony and ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Designed with Art Deco elements for symmetry and balance.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3 (Guest)
rooms.description: A guest bedroom on the upper level, integrating Vastu guidelines to ensure a peaceful ambiance while utilizing floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced ventilation.

openings.description: An elegantly designed staircase connecting ground and first floors, incorporating Art Deco motifs and ensuring smooth transitions between levels.
Access points to private balconies from the bedrooms, designed with Art Deco glass detailing for maximum natural light and ventilation.

additional_features.name: Art Deco Facade
additional_features.description: The villa's exterior is characterized by streamlined geometric shapes, ornamental detailing, and bold metallic accents, reflecting a classic Art Deco aesthetic while respecting local building norms.

additional_features.name: Energy Efficiency
additional_features.description: Use of floor-to-ceiling windows with energy-efficient glazing ensures natural light penetration and optimal ventilation, reducing reliance on artificial lighting and climate control systems.
